title: Crystal Chiropractic

description: Click the link on this page or call 732-899-7242 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Dr. Robert Crystal has been serving the needs of people as a chiropractor for over 30 years. Each visit is specifically tailored to meet your need for spinal adjustments. Please send us a message, or call us for an appointment, or book your appointment online. 732-899-7242 2200 River Road, Point Pleasant Boro, New Jersey 08742, United States
